main.name: Aleksei Beliaev
main.description: Full-stack software developer with wide experience of creating and maintaining IT systems. Deep knowledge of C#, JavaScript, SQL and many other technologies; 10+ experience in Microsoft SharePoint technologies, development of SharePoint and standalone applications, integration with databases and web-services. Experience in IT and a master’s degree in engineering makes me capable of executing complicated and challenging projects.
main.bio: I am looking for a job in Israel - Tel-Aviv, Rehovot, Haifa

education.school: Moscow Institute of Radio Equipment, Electronics and Automation
education.description: Development of radio engineering and communication environments

work.title: Senior Full-stack Software Developer
work.description: I successfully completed migration from SharePoint 2010 to SharePoint 2019 - 25k+ active users, ~1Tb content databases. I developed and implemented tools for direct data migration from SharePoint 2010 to 2019. Successfully led a small team of developers. Created a number of applications in stack of React, C# (.Net) and MS SQL for internal needs.

work.title: Full-stack SharePoint Software developer
work.description: Full support of the system based on Microsoft SharePoint. Collaborated with contractors to offer and then develop and implement different solutions. Integrated various features and technical specifications of applications, continuous functionality of the Portal system, developed SharePoint solutions for internal needs. Developed applications (Asp.net, C#, MSSQL, SharePoint) with data from several databases, AD, synchronous and asynchronous exchanges between different data sources.

work.title: Junior software developer
work.description: Development of simple applications and functions for internal needs of the company - polls, photogallery, making promo-pages. Simple SQL requests and usage in web-applications

skills.name: Asp.Net, C#: MVC application, WebForms, Console
Java Script and environmets (React, jQuery, NodeJS)
XHTML, CSS, XML: deep knowledge of formats and technologies
Microsoft SharePoint: development webparts, timer-jobs integration with external applications
